```{r setup}
library(knapsack)
set.seed(42)
n <- 2000
knapsack_objects <-
data.frame(
w=sample(1:4000, size = n, replace = TRUE),
v=runif(n = n, 0, 10000)
)
```



# 1.1.2 Brute force search

```{r}
a <- proc.time()
knapsack_brute_force(x=knapsack_objects[1:16,],W=3500)
b <- proc.time()
b-a
```


# 1.1.3 Dynamic programming

```{r}
a <- proc.time()
knapsack_dynamic(x=knapsack_objects[1:500,],W=3500)
b <- proc.time()
b-a
```


# 1.1.4 Greedy heuristic

```{r}
set.seed(42)
n <- 1000000
knapsack_objects_2 <-
data.frame(
w=sample(1:4000, size = n, replace = TRUE),
v=runif(n = n, 0, 10000)
)
```


```{r}
a <- proc.time()
greedy_knapsack(x=knapsack_objects_2[1:1000000,], W=3500)
b <- proc.time()
b-a
```
